column5: lots of fish being caght in  near grimsby now around the Niagara region ...a man today caught 15 chinook AND STEELHEAD
Port Colborne is on Lake Erie
yeah wrong title near grimsby there are  a lot of fish now
nope not that guy... the guy i'm talking about didn't get hung up...who is that guy? and where was this and when?
It appears to me that this guy fishing "solo" didn't get hung up either, but rather hooked up.
Solo you say. How did he get the action shot of himself then?? ?? ??

Was out yesterday by myself, launched at 50PT 10 miles out 290 FTW. 25 FT. down. lost count on the Rainbows 15 for sure.I think more, had 1 double. Man was I busy. Hard taking pictures by yourself. Biggest was 30" All fish released
Pat is talking about trolling I thinks.  There's been plenty of 2-3yr-old fish stuffing themselves along the south shore all summer.  Small but plentiful.
Some fine looking specimens you caught there Fish Farmer.  That 30" is a total hog, how'd she fight?
I think it was out of the water more than in. Was great. You don't get many days like that. I finally hit one of those days, you should have been here yesterday
Great going.. WOW I keep trying to get there yesterday but I always end up tommorow
